transcription.summary: Thanks for calling Grice Group in Cary, North Carolina.  If you're trying to reach Grice Whiteley, we'll try and connect you to Grice by ringing his office phone, as well as his mobile phone.  In case Grice is on a call already, it will allow you to wait up to 60 seconds on hold for Grice to finish it up and switch to your call.
